plot one network

plot_onenet.Rd

plot one network

plot_onenet(
  parcorr,
  mode = "circle",
  gname = "",
  lsize = 2.5,
  nodecolor = "grey",
  family.vec = 0,
  circlenet = F
)

Arguments

parcorr

partial correlation matrix
mode

ggnet2 mode, could be "circle" or "spring",...
gname

character, graph name.
lsize

numeric, label size
nodecolor

vector/character, specify the color for each node
family.vec

vector, assign nodes to families. In other words, it could be the classification / covariates of the nodes.
circlenet

logical, whether plot the network in a circle shape.

Value

a network figure

Contents
